subject: Concussions
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: The two new co-chairmen of the N.F.L. committee on head injuries were rebuked by members of a House panel for sounding “like the same old N.F.L.”
snippet: The two new co-chairmen of the N.F.L. committee on head injuries were rebuked by members of a House panel for sounding “like the same old N.F.L.”
